mapper.select: SELECT ss.id, ss.type, ss.name,ss.describe, ss.icon, ss.is_guide as isGuide, ss.blank_path as blankPath, ss.show_type as showType, ss.sort, sd.label as typeName, sr.id as resourceId FROM sys_system ss left join sys_dict sd on ss.type = sd.value and sd.delete_state = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_resource sr on sr.resource_id = ss.id and sr.type = 1 WHERE ss.delete_state = 0 ORDER BY ss.type, ss.sort

SELECT DISTINCT ss.id, ss.name, ss.describe, ss.icon, ss.is_guide as isGuide, ss.blank_path as blankPath, ss.show_type as showType, ss.sort, sd.label as typeName, sr.id as resourceId, sd.sort as sdSort, ss.sort as ssSort FROM sys_system ss LEFT JOIN sys_dict sd on ss.type = sd.value and sd.delete_state = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_resource sr on ss.id = sr.resource_id and sr.type = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_role_resource srr on sr.id = srr.resource_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur on srr.role_id = sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su on sur.user_id = su.id WHERE su.delete_state = 0 and ss.delete_state = 0 and su.id = #{userId} order by sd.sort, ss.sort
